title: Lay lady lay
creator_credit: Vladimir Jirawck, J. Hekrdla and Kratky Film
brief_description: Presents a clever, animated statement on morale and productivity, two key problems in every business field. An overworked hen is rejuvenated after a visit to her company psychiatrist.
